# Podcast Manager Code of Conduct

We are committed to providing a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for all, regardless of background, identity, or experience. This Code of Conduct outlines our expectations for participants in the Podcast Manager App, both online and in-person.

## Our Pledge

In the interest of fostering an open and inclusive environment, we, as contributors and maintainers, pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, disability, ethnicity, gender identity and expression, level of experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation.

## Expected Behavior

- Be respectful and considerate in your interactions.
- Use welcoming and inclusive language.
- Be supportive of others and their contributions.
- Refrain from any form of harassment, discrimination, or personal attacks.
- Respect differing viewpoints and experiences.

## Unacceptable Behavior

Unacceptable behavior includes, but is not limited to:

- Harassment, intimidation, or discrimination.
- Offensive, hurtful, or derogatory comments.
- Personal attacks or trolling.
- Deliberate disruption of discussions or the community.
- Any other conduct that violates the principles of this Code of Conduct.

## Reporting Violations

If you experience or witness behavior that violates this Code of Conduct, please contact the project maintainers.

## Consequences

Violations of this Code of Conduct may result in:

- A private or public reminder of the Code of Conduct.
- A request to modify or remove content.
- Temporary or permanent exclusion from participation in the community.

This Code of Conduct is adapted from the [Contributor Covenant](https://www.contributor-covenant.org/), version 2.0.
